EmailTemplate.name: Lorne Updated to price plan 2 - May 19.Updated to price plan 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Pricing Plan Has Been Updated
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
Your account has been updated and you are now a part of Pricing Plan 2. By making this change you will now be guaranteed a 15% annual savings with an average monthly spend of $1000 /month. You have also unlocked additional features including: - Aggressive pricing across all solutions - 1000 Key Value Items priced Better than Market - Great pricing on Grand & Toy Paper - Custom Online Dashboard - Scheduled Orders - Unlimited Users - Dedicated Account Manager + Access to Solutions Specialists upon request - Pay by credit card or Invoice - Exclusive offers and deals - Free Shipping** Feel free to login to start shopping under your new plan. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns, I am happy to assist.
Kind Regards, Lorne Sawyer Inside Account Manager If you no longer wish to receive emails from Grand & Toy please click here <[[https://go.grandandtoy.com/Unsubscribe.html]]> to update your preferences. 900 Belfast Road, Ottawa, ON K1G 0Z7 E-mail: LorneSawyer@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:LorneSawyer@grandandtoy.com]]> | Tel: 1-800-348-2184 Ext: 42534 Fax: 1-613-244-0765 Toll Free/Sans Frais Fax: 1-866-391-8555 Office Supplies | Cleaning & Breakroom | Interiors & Furniture | Technology | Print & Documents grandandtoy.com <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/?cmp=PricePlan_PROMO&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The content of this e-mail (and attachments, if any) is privileged and confidential, and intended solely for its designated recipient(s). Any dissemination, distribution or copying of this e-mail, other than by its intended recipient(s), is strictly prohibited. If you have received this e-mail by error, please delete it and notify us immediately by reply e-mail.
